title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: fancy compound satin
dimensions:
H x W (A - both selvages): 82.5 x 37.5 cm (32 1/2 x 14 3/4 in.)
H x W (B - both selvages): 64.7 x 57.7 cm (25 1/2 x 22 11/16 in.)
H x W (C - irregular shape): 57.5 x 44.5 cm (22 5/8 x 17 1/2 in.)
description: White and gold. White satin ground. Two wefts: gold and white. Design of rose sprays with two full roses and four rosebuds and leaves, created by floats of white and gold wefts.

Textile, 19th century.Medium: silk, metal
Technique: fancy compound satin. 1941-80-1-a.
